metadata.title: CVE-2022-20792 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Fixed a possible multi-byte heap buffer overflow write vulnerability in the signature database load module.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2022-20792` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

clamav - 0.103.6+dfsg-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
clamav-base - 0.103.6+dfsg-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
clamav-daemon - 0.103.6+dfsg-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
clamav-freshclam - 0.103.6+dfsg-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
clamav-milter - 0.103.6+dfsg-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
clamav-testfiles - 0.103.6+dfsg-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
clamdscan - 0.103.6+dfsg-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
libclamav9 - 0.103.6+dfsg-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: clamav package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.103.6+dfsg-0ubuntu0.21.10.1').
